name: Basketball Shooting - Smashhit
description:
Basket & Ball is a simple but very addictive 3d sport game. Its based on realistic physics.

You will be presented with a limited number of ball and you will need to complete the missions.

How to play:
1. Touch the screen
2. Drag the dotted line to change the power and angle
3. Release to shoot

Features:
* Easy to control, fun for every age players.
* Great shooting experience.
* Simple but special picture style.
* 11 backgrounds to choose from, like airport, beach, rooftop and so on.
*** More Interesting missions coming on your way. ***
Don't forget to leave your feedback at m.nadeemunawar@gmail.com
